mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOM_EXP ( FAMILY_CUST_NO, EXP_STATE, EXP_VALUE, REG_CUST_NO, REG_DT, REG_IP, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{familyCustNo}, #{expState}, #{expValue}, #{regCustNo}, NOW(), #{regIp}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(LEVEL,0) as level , COUNT(*) as checkData , IFNULL(FC.FAMILY_CUST_EXP,0) as familyCustExp , IFNULL(START_EXP,0) as startExp , IFNULL(END_EXP,0) as endExp FROM FAMILY_CUSTOM FC, LEVEL WHERE FAMILY_CUST_NO =#{familyCustNo} AND START_EXP <= FC.FAMILY_CUST_EXP ORDER BY LEVEL DESC LIMIT 1
